spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities apply Ratfang Toxin to your target, stacking up to 5 times.
Use: Release all toxin stacks to deal 595,937 Nature damage, plus 68,106 per stack over 5 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 7,791 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 1.9 million Fire damage to your primary target and 156,577 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
